name: dotenvx-pm2
description: Example usage of dotenvx with pm2
author: Michael Kalygin

scripts.start:json: SH=shell_initial SH_DE=shell_initial SH_PM=shell_initial SH_DE_PM=shell_initial dotenvx run --env-file .env.initial --overload -- ../../bin/pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --env initial
scripts.reload:json: SH=shell_updated SH_DE=shell_updated SH_PM=shell_updated SH_DE_PM=shell_updated dotenvx run --env-file .env.updated --overload -- ../../bin/pm2 reload ecosystem.config.cjs --env updated --update-env
scripts.test:json: ../../bin/pm2 update && npm run delete:json && npm run start:json && npm run reload:json
